title: Most valuable brands in Indonesia 2019
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: As of 2019 , the Most valuable brands in Indonesia were Bank_Central_Asia_(BCA) and Bank_Mandiri devices .
The Bank_Central_Asia_(BCA) and Bank_Rakyat_Indonesia_(BRI) represented 13.05 billion of the total value billion , while for example the Bank_Mandiri accounted for 7.02 billion of the billion .

value use When it comes to usage patterns by value users , the French declared in a 2019 survey mostly to take pictures and videos with their mobile devices ( 51 billion of respondents ) and to use the alarm clock function ( 47 billion ) .
gold: In 2019 , Indonesia 's most valuable brand in terms of brand value was Bank Central Asia ( BCA ) , with a brand value of 13.05 billion U.S. dollars . In terms of growth , however , retail e-commerce site tokopedia was the fastest-rising brand , with a 487 percent growth in 2019 . This was followed by travel e-commerce site Traveloka at 111 percent , and ride-hailing start-up Go-Jek , which had 88 percent growth .
